title: Add two "Random" ingame events w/o breaking the game
body:
Event 1: The Void
Activation method: once two zz'rot portals are placed ( Both blue and red must place two for a total of four ) the event will trigger
Effect: Hostile voidgates spawn randomly around the map creating powerful creatures that will attack anything that comes nearby ( This includes creep camps, Minions, Super minions, Dragon and champions but will steer clear of baron and rift herald
also these voidgates will not go near active turrets but have a chance of spawning nearby destroyed turrets

Event 2: Weather ( Thunderstorm and Icestorm ) Summoners rift = Thunder and ARAM = ice
Activation method: Random 35% chance to activate at a random point ingame
effect 1: Thunderstorm
Thunderstorm reduces vision by 25% and applies a global slow for the duration of the storm 
How greatly the slow effects champions is randomized with a maximum of 30% global slow

Effect 2: Icestorm
Icestorm greatly reduces movement and vision and can damage champions who venture too far from the safety of the nexus
damage is increased by distance from nexus to maximum of 1.5% HP per min



---------
Now I'm interested to see what you'll comeup with ;)
post your events down below
if you cannot think of two simply post one :)

Event 1: WAAAARRRRRR
Requirements : One team must have two demacian champions, one must be {{champion:86}} {{champion:59}} or {{champion:99}}, and the other team must have two Noxian Champions, one must be {{champion:122}} {{champion:50}} or {{champion:240}}, and each Demacian/Noxian champion must have atleast 5 kills.
When activated, the Demacian champions must kill the two Noxian champions and vice versa, If Demacia is successful, every champion on that team receives 200 gold and their team gets 10% increased AD, AP, Armor and Mr, if Noxus is successful, The two Noxian Champions gain 500 gold each and they receive 15% increased sats for 3 minutes.

Event 2: Minion swarm
Requirements: The game must be past 60 minutes and each team needs atleast 30 kills.
When activated, There is no time in-between minion waves and all minions become cannon minions, if the inhibitor is destroyed, a bonus 3 super minions are spawned.

Curiosity Killed The Baron
If Baron is alive at 50 minutes and Stays alive until 2 hours, baron disables, and wanders the map for the next hour, spectating teamfights or other cases of action.

Event 1: Rat Infestation.
Randomly on The Butchers Bridge map Wharf rats will overrun the map, attacking all minions and champions. 
minions and towers will agro to them, they won't attack structures, they spawn in both bases at the same time, and will avoid the shop. the number of rats will be around 10-15 per side, and it can happen multiple times a game. Wharf rats will use the model of and act like razor fins, only with a name change to denote their difference.
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/83/Razorfin.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20150710030057

Event 2: Elder Territory.
This is a two part event

Part 1. If an elder dragon has been alive for 10 minutes, A second elder dragon will spawn and fight the first elder dragon. When one of the two Dragons die the other dragon fully heals and gains the elder dragon buff, regardless of who kills it. Dragons will not agro to players while fighting, but they will instead use an aoe attack that can damage the whole pit. if one is killed by a player the team that gets the kill gains the buff like normal, but the surviving dragon will immediately agro to any nearby player.

Part 2.  At any point past 45 minutes an elder dragon can spawn near any minion or monster other than baron or elder and kill them. it will not target players, but during this time the dragon is untargetable.
